an5.139:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno nago na rajaraho hoti na rajabhoggo, na ranno angamtveva sankham gacchati.
an5.139:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti rupanam, akkhamo saddanam, akkhamo gandhanam, akkhamo rasanam, akkhamo photthabbanam.
an5.139:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti rupanam?
an5.139:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago sangamagato hatthikayam va disva assakayam va disva rathakayam va disva pattikayam va disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.139:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti rupanam.
an5.139:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti saddanam?
an5.139:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago sangamagato hatthisaddam va sutva assasaddam va sutva rathasaddam va sutva pattisaddam va sutva bheripanavasankhatinavaninnadasaddam va sutva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.139:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti saddanam.
an5.139:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti gandhanam?
an5.139:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago sangamagato ye te ranno naga abhijata sangamavacara tesam muttakarisassa gandham ghayitva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.139:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti gandhanam.
an5.139:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti rasanam?
an5.139:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago sangamagato ekissa va tinodakadattiya vimanito dvihi va tihi va catuhi va pancahi va tinodakadattihi vimanito samsidati visidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.139:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti rasanam.
an5.139:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti photthabbanam?
an5.139:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago sangamagato ekena va saravegena viddho, dvihi va tihi va catuhi va pancahi va saravegehi viddho samsidati visidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.139:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti photthabbanam.
an5.139:7.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato ranno nago na rajaraho hoti na rajabhoggo na ranno angamtveva sankham gacchati.
an5.139:8.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato bhikkhu na ahuneyyo hoti na pahuneyyo na dakkhineyyo na anjalikaraniyo na anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an5.139:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rupanam, akkhamo saddanam, akkhamo gandhanam, akkhamo rasanam, akkhamo photthabbanam.
an5.139:9.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rupanam?
an5.139:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva rajaniye rupe sarajjati, na sakkoti cittam samadahitum.
an5.139:9.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rupanam.
an5.139:10.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddanam?
an5.139:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotena saddam sutva rajaniye sadde sarajjati, na sakkoti cittam samadahitum.
an5.139:10.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddanam.
an5.139:11.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhanam?
an5.139:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ghanena gandham ghayitva rajaniye gandhe sarajjati, na sakkoti cittam samadahitum.
an5.139:11.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhanam.
an5.139:12.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasanam?
an5.139:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jivhaya rasam sayitva rajaniye rase sarajjati, na sakkoti cittam samadahitum.
an5.139:12.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasanam.
an5.139:13.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti photthabbanam?
an5.139:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kayena photthabbam phusitva rajaniye photthabbe sarajjati, na sakkoti cittam samadahitum.
an5.139:13.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti photthabbanam.
